title: [Large-scale] Web-Based Computer-Assisted English Instructional Design for Middle School

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Web-based learning system operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Students can acquire and utilize 500 intermediate-level English vocabulary items within six months through a web-based system
Learners can self-correct over 80% of grammatical errors using real-time feedback functionality
Students apply English reading and writing skills to real-world scenarios through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
